sentence.Network_en: His failures underline the difference between theatre and film direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的失败说明了导演戏剧和电影是不同的。

sentence.Network_en: Please underline the noun clauses in the passage.
sentence.Network_cn: 请用线画出短文中的名词性从句.

sentence.Network_en: Their brief visit has served to underline the deep differences between the two countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们短暂的访问恰恰凸显了两国间分歧的严重程度。

entry.def: If one thing, for example an action or an event, underlines another, it draws attention to it and emphasizes its importance.

example.ex: The report underlined his concern that standards were at risk...
example.tran: 报告强调了他对道德水准可能会受影响所表示的关注。

example.ex: The decision to keep him in hospital for a second night underlines the seriousness of his injury...
example.tran: 让他在医院再住一晚的决定表明了其伤势的严重性。

entry.def: If you underline something such as a word or a sentence, you draw a line underneath it in order to make people notice it or to give it extra importance.

example.ex: Underline the following that apply to you...
example.tran: 在符合自身情况的项下画线。

example.ex: Take two coloured pens and underline the positive and negative words.
example.tran: 用两支彩笔分别在表示肯定和否定意义的词下面画线。

means.word_mean: 1. a line drawn underneath (especially under written matter)
2. draw a line or lines underneath to call attention to

auth_sentence.content: It could also underline the dangers of widespread deforestation.
auth_sentence.res_content: It could also underline the dangers of widespread deforestation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It could also underline the dangers of widespread deforestation.

auth_sentence.content: House prices underline this divide between city and county.
auth_sentence.res_content: House prices underline this divide between city and county.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: House prices underline this divide between city and county.

auth_sentence.content: The planning for the fund-raisers seemed to underline this estrangement.
auth_sentence.res_content: The planning for the fund-raisers seemed to underline this estrangement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The planning for the fund-raisers seemed to underline this estrangement.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的

Sentence.sentence: Underline the key words and phrases.
What does the author mean by "… you're just underlining his faults" (Line 4, Para
If you tell your dim friend that he has the potential of an Einstein, you're just underlining his faults.

means.word_mean: 在…下面画线; 画底线标出

sentences.en: Please underline the noun clauses in the passage.
sentences.cn: 请用线画出短文中的名词性从句。

sentences.en: He underlined his signature with a little flourish.
sentences.cn: 他挥笔在签名下画了一条线。

means.word_mean: 加强, 强调, 突现

sentences.en: That article underlined the same problem.
sentences.cn: 那篇文章强调了同一个问题。

sentences.en: In his speech he underlined several points.
sentences.cn: 他在讲话中强调了几点。

sentences.en: She underlined her disapproval of the proceedings by walking out.
sentences.cn: 她退席以表示不赞成这些做法。

sentences.en: The sudden summoning of the Cabinet underlines the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 内阁会议的突然召开, 突出了局势的严重性。

sentences.en: The accident at the factory underlines the need of better safety standards.
sentences.cn: 工厂里发生的事故表明了需要更高的安全标准。

jushi.english: The rice crisis underlined an embarrassing problem that the government faces.
jushi.chinese: 大米危机使政府面临的困窘问题更为突出。

jushi.english: The book is underlined for publication next month.
The sudden summoning of the Cabinet underlines the seriousness of the situation.
jushi.chinese: 内阁会议的突然召开,突出了局势的严重性。
